column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Where to start? Okay so this is counter ordering with table service. First up ordering pastries which no brunch is complete without. Go for the chocolate croissant or cranberry scone... yummy. Next up dessert choice
column2: who doesn't want to violas a dessert before a meal... perfect set up. At the register
column3: order food. Go for the tamale Benedict.... yea I said it
column4: tamale. True masterpiece. The quiche and steak salad were equally impressive and I had a tiny bit of food envy with the sandwiches that were rolling by me. Overall
column5: expect crowds on the weekends but well executed food and service.
